_header: Of Saint Margaret the virgin pure
Subjects: Margaret, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Osbern Bokenam, Life of St. Margaret — in 8-line stanzas

BLAru327.First Lines:
Of seynt margarete the virgyne pureWych lyknyd is to a precyous
                    margaryte…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…Of the ioye be wher thou doost dwelleWych how gret is no
                    tunge kan telle. Amen
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
Vita Sancta Margarita Virginis et Martiris Prologus (later hand, f. 5), The
                    lyf of seynt margarete (index, f. 193)
